questions.question: Do you know About Graphic Era
questions.answer: Graphic Era University is renowned for its focus on engineering, management, and allied disciplines. It has a strong reputation for academic excellence and industry-oriented programs.

questions.question: Can you tell me about the campus facilities?
questions.answer: Graphic Era University boasts state-of-the-art facilities, including modern classrooms, well-equipped labs, a library, sports facilities, and hostels. The campus is designed to provide a conducive environment for learning and growth

questions.question: Tell me about the engineering courses offered at Graphic Era
questions.answer: Graphic Era University offers a range of engineering programs, including Computer Science, Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, and more. Each program is designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of the respective field.
